form.label: MikroTik DNS Live usage
form.description: Use this to see what units are online on the net. It sees if a host request a dns within a 5 minute windows and count it as 1

search.query: `index` sourcetype=mikrotik module=dns eventtype=dns_query | eval host_name=coalesce(identity,host) | eval data=host | stats dc(src_ip) as count by data host_name | eval info=host_name."-".data." (".count.")" | sort -count

`index` sourcetype=mikrotik module=dns eventtype=dns_query host="$Host$" | eval host_name=coalesce(identity,host) | lookup dnslookup clientip as src_ip OUTPUT clienthost as src_host | eval src_host=coalesce(src_host,src_ip) | bucket span=5m _time | dedup src_host _time | eval data=src_host | stats count by data src_ip | eval info=data."-".src_ip." (".count.")" | sort -count

`index` sourcetype=mikrotik module=dns host="$Host$" eventtype=dns_query | eval host_name=coalesce(identity,host) | lookup dnslookup clientip as src_ip OUTPUT clienthost as src_host | eval src_host=coalesce(src_host,src_ip) | search src_host="$src_host$" | bucket span=10m _time | dedup src_host _time | timechart span=10m count by src_host limit=0
